Havok Physics Visual Debugger Application
-------------------------------------

hkVisualDebugger.exe is the Havok Physics visual debugger application.  This
has been tested on Windows 2000/XP (it requires DirectX 8 for its user input)
For more information see the chapter on the visual debugger in the Havok user
guide which you will find in the docs directory of your Havok distribution.


IMPORTANT: PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and Nintendo Wii users
-----------------------------------------------

It is vital that all PlayStation2, PlayStation 3 and Nintendo Wii users read
the Quick Start guide located in the docs directory before attempting to use
the visual debugger.
